title: RadarSFD: Single-Frame Diffusion with Pretrained Priors for Radar Point Clouds
summary: This paper introduces RadarSFD, a conditional latent diffusion framework that reconstructs dense LiDAR-like point clouds from a single radar frame. It aims to improve radar imaging resolution without relying on synthetic aperture or multi-frame aggregation, making it practical for small robotic platforms.
